doc:
Frank Griffin (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Griffin_(director) 0 Frank Griffin (September 17, 1886 – March 17, 1953) was an American film director, writer, and actor of the silent era. He directed 29 films between 1914 and 1924. He was born in Norfolk, Virginia, and died in Los Angeles, California from a heart attack. Frank_Griffin ( September_17_,_1886 – March_17_,_1953 ) was an_American_film_director , writer , and actor of the_silent_era . He directed 29_films between 1914_and_1924 . He was_born in Norfolk , Virginia , and died in Los_Angeles , California from a_heart_attack .
